website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option that doesn't sacrifice quality or style, and for a fraction of the cost.
pros: Machine washable for easy maintenance and clean up
Available in 7 sizes ranging from adult XX small to adult XX large
Designed to perform in all weather conditions
Costs less than half of other well known brands
The back of the glove is made of a flexible, durable material
cons: Only comes in 2 color options: black or white

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were a replacement my son who lost his Under Armour gloves. These did OK but after a few games, they were no longer gripping. Tried cleaning with anti-bacterial lotion like some stated. It worked but only for one game. After complaining and writing a bad review, the seller reached out to me to offer a refund if I take down the negative review. I wanted the refund so I took the review down. Now that I got my refund, I am warning that the reviews are a lot worse than it shows since the seller gives refunds in return for taking down the negative review. Stay away from this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: M. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Fit comfortably, work well
customer_reviews.text: I'm tearing up my weekly pick up flag football game with these beauties. Pete from accounting couldn't guard me if he tried. I was already awesome, but now I catch every ball that comes at me. TB12 only wishes he had a receiver like me. Women love me. Defenders fear me. Antonio Brown wants to be me. Buy these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Allright Now

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip on the palm area and extra small fits ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are sick!!! Excellent grip on the palm area and extra small fits my 11 year old perfectly! They seem like they're decent quality and will more than likely hold up.
customer_reviews.author: A Yambupah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves.
customer_reviews.text: these are great quality gloves, i catch everything that comes my way with these. one star off because i think they run a tad small, i am an averaged sized male and went with medium. they will do but probably could have went large for better fit. have used these 4 times already and no wear and tear evident.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Great for football
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy at 6' 4" so fits to size. Great glove and sturdy. Handles the vigor's of a football game. Great grip if dry but if gets wet mostly worthless. great value for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Grippy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these for football games. They have ultra grip when new and lasted about a season. Stiil a good value. They didnt rip they just started showinf signs of wear on the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: P. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 13 year old that started playing flag football. He really liked them. He has taken them to three games so far and it was raining for two of them. He just had to hang them to dry after his game and they are good for the next one! We bought Adult Small and he is 5’2”, they fit him just right but they probably won’t fit him after this season.
customer_reviews.author: ERB

customer_reviews.title: Real cardboard handler APPROVED.
customer_reviews.text: I work with cardboard a lot and I needed gloves that afforded a great grip, without compromising fit and durability. Currently these gloves have undergone a 51 hrs work week and, there are no rips and the palms are perfectly intact. The nylon, rubber and leather backing help to prevent skinned knuckles. The perforations on the fingers, allow airflow to eliminate sweaty palms. When wet, the palms slip on metal and plastic surfaces but provide excellent additional cardboard grip.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Gloves. Will but again!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the money. Used them last minute in my men’s Tuff flag football league. Great grip! Only hiccup is that they don’t “perfectly” fit your wrist/heal of your hand as I’d like. Doesn’t affect your playing what so ever. Absolutely makes catching footballs 10x easier! Getting another pair when these are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Del Re

customer_reviews.title: Tore quickly, do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ripped on the seam after 7 flag football games. I guess that’s worth the cost of them. If you’re looking for durable gloves, these are not a good choice
customer_reviews.author: J&S

customer_reviews.title: Great Youth Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old son rec'd these as a Christmas present this year. He is over the moon with these gloves! He LOVES the way these gloves fit & feel and he says the grip on them is excellent!! For $17, I would definitely recommend these youth football gloves. No idea (yet) on the durability though, as he just rec'd them. *Fingers crossed* they last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, and great price. I use them for flag football and you can catch a ball with 2 fingers. Can't believe I used to play without gloves. Update: just bought a second pair for our team to use!
customer_reviews.author: J. Vieitez

customer_reviews.title: Get a grip and choose these (har har har ;) )
customer_reviews.text: Okay, these gloves awesome. The sizing is accurate (Large is accurate for average size/smaller end) man hands. They breathe decently and stay put where they need to and give where they need to. The tackiness is on par. These gloves make you feel like OBJ and Brees all in one. But you know, poor. Get playing!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie or Holly

customer_reviews.title: I am glad we Ignored the 1 star reviews
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. He uses them almost daily. So far they seem to keep keep up. They didn't stick much when new. Cleaning of the dust with a damp cloth did the trick. Now they go in the washer machine with other laundry and then let them air-dry. The stickiness after this "treatment" is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves for Casual Players
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother as kind of a half gag gift because I always joked how he doesn't have hands when we throw the football around the yard. They ended up being a nice buy though. Good stick to them. I have noticed him catching more balls with them on vs. him not having them on. Knocked a star off though because when the ball gets slightly wet then the gloves are disproportionately slippery. Great for the price point overall for people not playing in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT youth sizes
customer_reviews.text: The gloves themselves are just fine, but completely the wrong size for children. Even with taking careful measurements as shown in the description, these gloves do NOT fit like youth gloves and should not be sold as such.
customer_reviews.author: Felina

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Brought them for my daughter who is playing flag football. I read a few not so good reviews but I still decided to purchase these. She loves them and is catching plenty of footballs. They are very sticky for grip. Glad I decided to try them and not just rely on what others have said. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LaKesha Collins

customer_reviews.title: My kids like the colors but they seem pretty big
customer_reviews.text: My boys like the colors of these gloves but even with measuring their hands, etc the gloves are huge on them. We ordered an xxs and an xs and the palms fit but the finger tips were so long that these looked more like kids wearing adult gardening gloves. They’re a little odd
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 10-year-old to catch the football in New Jersey when it was relatively cold it worked great allowed him to grab the ball like a pro and at the same time kept his hands relatively warm good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality gloves. Ordered an XL based on 3 different brands I tried on in local stores. I'd say the run a bit big. I had a 1/2 inch of room in the tips and the palms were pretty baggy. Exchanged for a large and they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyMortimer

customer_reviews.title: No more butter fingers
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son for Christmas. He wears them everyday even though he hates to wear gloves. They fit perfectly and he likes the grip he gets when tossing a football with his dad. I think the price was perfect. The rubbery grip fits the entire hand. They are perfect for kids just learning how to catch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it if you have a player
customer_reviews.text: Not durable my 12-year-old son had them for a week and they started to have small crack lines in them. Also, they don't keep your hands warm doing late night games
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My son says they really help with catching and holding on to the football! Ordered the large. My son is 13 years old, 5' 7" with average adult sized hands. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Lalita

customer_reviews.title: It's a get what you pay for product.  Inferior material.
customer_reviews.text: This is a get what you pay for and it was cheaply made, inferior materials to Under Armor. I would spend the extra money and get a value product one's child can really use.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia b.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, did not stick at all and when they got wet it was even worse. I can catch better bare handed. Sent these back. Would never buy or recommend
customer_reviews.author: DM2812

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a bad substitute for some of the nicer gloves out there. The grip doesn’t last very long and they’re not quite as comfortable as some of the bigger brands. But considering it’s less than half the price, it’s not a bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Youngman

customer_reviews.title: Baggy palms; very thick material
customer_reviews.text: Bought Adult S and M for my 15 yo son to play football. M was too long and baggy in the palm, S was tight length and width but - due to thick rubbery material - also too baggy in the palm again!! Returning both
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Will get the job done, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these with the hopes of having an all-white set for my upcoming season. The gloves looked amazing after opening them up. The material was thicker on the top of the hand, which I liked because it would likely prevent ripping. However, the gloves did run large for their size (XL) and I was looking for a closer-fitting glove. Also noticed compared to other gloves I've used in the past the tack on the gloves wasn't as strong as other name brands. Not sure if this is a feature of the manufacture, but I'm returning because I just don't feel this will do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Garrisoncohen

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap material. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these at first. But we’ve now determined they are garbage. We received the gloves the first week of September. He plays football for school Monday - Friday. Eo pretty much had use for approximately 4 weeks. Each glove got a hole during the 4the week and he can no longer use them. The window for returning closed just as they became useless. so.... Quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Powcatton

customer_reviews.title: Good for flag football on turf. wouldn't recommend for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I am ~ 5'9 170lbs. Got this for flag football. They are slightly loose but they will do. I can tell that they will be good for this season but I don't expect these to last for more than a year or two. I would not get theses if you are playing aggressive outdoor flag or actual football. The dirt will definitely shorten the lifetime of these. Buy a brand name if you are worried about the grip. if you dont care these will do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, starting offensive (JV) lineman. They ripped at the seams a few weeks into the season, but he still wears them. They are super protective and the kids on the team think they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find this brand that competes with UA, NIKE & ADIDAS
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell if these are durable. My husband loves the fit and feel. Great alternative to the other brands who overcharge for lesser quality gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Consummate Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son plays football for i-9 and needed gloves as he’s a WR.. fits great and he loves them. Great price for product
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: My go to gloves
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for months now. Bought a pair of more expensive gloves out of curiosity recently and went back to these. No tears and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great grip, durable so far, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 3-4 months in but they’ve held up to my playing twice a week. Great grip, comfortable fit and they definitely seem a lot more durable at the seams than a lot of gloves I’ve worn. Will return later with updates as they breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Worn out so fast
customer_reviews.text: My son wears it couple of times and already had some tear/damaged. Football season has not completed yet. We had to exchange it for other one and it came out the same. So he had no glove at his last 2 games as we're not going to order another one till next year. Its probably that is what we get as its cheap. We do not know if the expensive glove would make any difference. Or is it normal?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. My son plays tight end and defensive end. They worked equally well for both positions. Tacky inside to help catch and padded on the back to protect hands on defense. Update- Buying second pair. His hands grew since last season.
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves he's able to catch the football real good in them they fit very well and they last
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these for football. I highly recommend them. Very durable and great grip on them! He ordered the yellow first, and liked them so much, he got a second pair in white
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son says that the gloves really help him throw better and he really likes the material.
customer_reviews.author: Paige D

customer_reviews.title: Lasted all season
customer_reviews.text: They lasted my son his whole freshman season. I'll order more. The xl fit my tall, lanky son well.
customer_reviews.author: LacyA

customer_reviews.title: White Football Gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves but the stickiness is starting to wear off. Not sure how much longer he will be able to use them but for now still working good. Started using them July 23rd and today is August 22nd. Great comfort and fit. Ordered mens size large.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Tricked my son!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a $50 pair of these gloves. I went to amazon and these are amazing. He can’t even tell the difference and he is using them everyday! So worth the money he’s 15 5’5 I got him a small fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: vangie matthew

customer_reviews.title: My little brother love them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother for Christmas since he is really getting into football and he really really likes these gloves
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy gloves at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves at a great price. I use them for flag football and they’ve held up well over the season!
customer_reviews.author: Polly Pocket

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart within 2 weeks of receiving and I wasnt playing everyday. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hempton-fink

customer_reviews.title: Pure crap!
customer_reviews.text: They didn't even last a full season and I only played once a week for 2.5 months. It had unstitched everywhere and now they have to go in the garbage. Complete waste of money, durability is non-existent, and the only positive about these gloves were the grip. But what good does a grip do when you have to throw them away??? Don't buy these gloves! But a higher quality that last more than 2.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Park

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: Buying it for my younger brother as a birthday gift. Very durable and stretchy glove. Love the deign as well.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these....a lot of fun just going out in the yard and throwing the ball around with them. Had for 4 months now and holding up well against a 9 year old boy
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Look good, not that sticky
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are good, fit well, they are not as sticky as my grandson thought they would be
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them. Not as sticky as some of the others we have had
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really are sticky!
customer_reviews.text: They really are sticky! My daughter is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Brosnan 6

customer_reviews.title: Smooth glove fits large won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: We ordered an adult XS for my 11 year old son. We should have gotten an XXS, also he said that he couldn’t grip the ball well with it. Not sure if it’s from the size but the glove is completely smooth, no grips, so I think I will order a different kind instead of the smaller size!
customer_reviews.author: MeadowBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels good. I ordered an adults xs for my grandson and they barely fit me. Would definitely suggest ordering a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: deandean

customer_reviews.title: good for kids football
customer_reviews.text: bought for a 13yr old boy who likes to play catch in the back yard. they were surprisingly sticky for the price. the adult medium fit him pretty good, he will grow in to them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Locke

customer_reviews.title: Son liked them
customer_reviews.text: My son received these for a gift. So far so good and he really likes them
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great stickiness but gloves don't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my son - Wide Receiver in High School Football. He is not in every play, actually only plays about 1/2 of each game, yet these gloves only last 7 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: RebaB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect for grabbing boxes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and perfect for grabbing boxes. I use these in a distribution center and it helps me to grip pacages perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift, but in the small amount of time I had it, it seemed like the stickiness of the material on the palms would really work. Gifted it to a 12 year old and the sizing was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: TruthTeller

customer_reviews.title: New
customer_reviews.text: Just got these. They seem to run slightly larger and others I have tried and used. I will amend my review in time
customer_reviews.author: mlee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible gloves, and I don't have high standards
customer_reviews.text: I rarely play football so was just looking for something basic. These are garbage - within 5 minutes I switched to bare hands. My buddy even commented upon glancing at them that they looked very cheap. Do not buy, even if you just play casually.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the gloves for tossing a football around at lunchtime in school with his friends and it keeps his hands warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Colgan

customer_reviews.title: Teared after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: These started to tear after only 2 uses. Not satisfied at all will be staying with cutters gloves I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cue

customer_reviews.title: ... month into my son’s flag football schedule but he liked them and fit was good
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 month into my son’s flag football schedule but he liked them and fit was good. Ordered an Adult Small for my tall 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: JAF

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old son. He LOVES them! Good fit and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Buckles

customer_reviews.title: Cant return
customer_reviews.text: Can not return. I dont have a ups store in my small town.
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Who knew I could catch?
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves because I'm playing in a flag football league for fun and to stay in shape. They're amazing! Suddenly I'm making one handed catches like it's nothing. Not sure how well they'll work wet; I went to pick up my water bottle which had some condensation around the outside of it and it slipped right out of my hands. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob K

customer_reviews.title: Ty
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for the entire season and the lasted which was a surprise cause other brands have come undone only in the practice season
customer_reviews.author: Jose r diaz salazar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Perfect fit. Very professional and super duper fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: CJONES

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck....VERY SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses gloves for our high school senior. A 4 year, 2 way starter and has gone through many different brands of gloves. These seem to be his favorite. They were actually replacements for a higher rated, higher priced pair, which were returned. The kid loves these gloves, wish we had discovered this brand 3 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fraijo

customer_reviews.title: Runs large but well liked
customer_reviews.text: We measured the hand as suggested but the fingers do run long. This did not interfere with catching the ball. Nice tacky surface for grip.
customer_reviews.author: star1711

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: My son use the gloves for football and he is a WR and be loves them. They are really sticky. I will be getting more as the season goes on
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but good enough
customer_reviews.text: I used for a full high school season they were pretty good. I'm naturally good at catching but these gloves didn't help much. Once they get dirty u can't wash them or get them "sticky" Again. But personally I'd buy again for next year
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Icky Icky!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are sticky! If you could almost catch with one hand before, you will now be able to do so. I just wonder how long the "stick" will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: My son used these for football and said they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: deidra

customer_reviews.title: Great for how inexpensive it is
customer_reviews.text: Great for how inexpensive it is - used for extra geip for some workouts
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Payne

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves for the price my an lost is green pair these are bright and can be seen in the football field.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's suppose to. You just have to be good at catching for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good deal and really do help if you're playing in a men's league or something. They retain their stickiness moderately well and clean easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good glove, good price
customer_reviews.text: my 10 year old son liked them. they are sticky and fit him well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: They do their job but would be better with a snug fit
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. He’s 9 yrs old and they’re a little big. They do their job but would be better with a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: heather A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip
customer_reviews.text: The grip on these are so awesome my son can catch his football only using 3 fingers
customer_reviews.author: Renee Perry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for biking
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with specialty biking gloves. These have incredible grip, comfort, and visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J. Mareino

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good don’t have any complaints great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Bastien

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves really helped make it much easier catching footballs especially in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Albiond

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price point. Didnt stay sticky very long
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves last Saturday and they had absolutely no stick to them at all, plus the stitching was already coming out before I even took them out of their bag.....first time buying this brand and can definitely say it will be my last
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Stempin

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Nice gloves.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the gloves. They are a great fit and the price is perfect for a child that is still growing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves these gloves. Have a great amount of 'stick.'
customer_reviews.author: David Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves but run a little big.
customer_reviews.text: Gloves work amazing and they are very durable. The stickiness of the gloves has lasted multiple games and has yet to wear down at all like some name brand gloves I used to get at local sports and outdoors stores. Only issue I had was they fit a little loose even tho I ordered the size I wear other gloves in. But overall definitely worth a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ColtsFanForever

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than expected but ok
customer_reviews.text: They were a little bigger than the other brands my son tried on in the stores but close enough that we'll keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These work out perfectly as a work glove for a package Handler!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Adaskin

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size
customer_reviews.text: These are nice gloves for the price. Our 50 lb 1st grader uses them. They are a touch too big.
customer_reviews.author: R Panek

customer_reviews.title: No Sfia certification logo
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when buying this product it does not have an SFIA certification tag so my son could not use it On his high school team. But the gloves them work great And durable
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Only Good.
customer_reviews.text: They are good and useful. But I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS ELLIS

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good gloves for the price. Have held together very nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Almost lasted a whole season which is saying alot with my son he usually goes through 4or5 pairs in season
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves and plays with them almost everytime he is outside. Well made and exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: April Capps

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for football season, excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ocana

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great glove
customer_reviews.text: For what its worth its a very great glove. Helped me in a lot of tight coverage situations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Seibertron Pro 3.0 Elite Ultra-Stick Sports Receiver Glove Football Gloves Youth and Adult
product_meta.description:
superior performance durability and fit 
durable and flexible materials back of hand 
performs in many conditions 
machine washable 

Select the size method
Adult XXS=Youth M(6.1"-6.7",15.5cm-17cm), palm circumference, not including thumb
Adult XS=Youth L(6.7"-7.3",17cm-18.5cm), palm circumference, not including thumb
Adult S(7.3"-7.9",18.5cm-20cm),palm circumference, not including thumb
